personalInfo.name: Alex Johnson
personalInfo.title: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer
personalInfo.summary: Passionate full-stack software engineer with 6+ years of experience building scalable web applications and leading cross-functional teams. Expertise in React, Node.js, and cloud technologies with a strong focus on user experience and system performance.

workExperience.companyDescription: Leading fintech company providing payment solutions for e-commerce platforms
achievements: Led development of a microservices architecture that improved system scalability by 300%
Mentored 3 junior developers and established code review best practices
Implemented automated testing pipeline reducing deployment bugs by 85%
Architected real-time payment processing system handling 10K+ transactions per minute

workExperience.companyDescription: Software consultancy building custom web applications for enterprise clients
achievements: Built responsive web applications serving 100K+ daily active users
Optimized application performance resulting in 40% faster load times
Collaborated with UX team to implement accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1 AA)
Developed RESTful APIs and GraphQL endpoints for mobile app integration

workExperience.companyDescription: Early-stage startup focused on AI-powered content management solutions
achievements: Developed the company's first web application from scratch using React
Implemented responsive design supporting all major browsers and devices
Created reusable component library reducing development time by 30%
Collaborated closely with design team to ensure pixel-perfect implementations
President of Computer Science Student Association

projects.name: TaskFlow - Project Management Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive project management platform with real-time collaboration features, built for small to medium teams.
highlights: Automated backup and data recovery system

projects.name: WeatherWise - Weather Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive weather analytics dashboard providing detailed forecasts and historical data visualization.

projects.name: EcoTracker - Carbon Footprint Calculator
projects.description: A mobile-responsive web app helping users track and reduce their carbon footprint through daily activities.
